channel.title: Mitb
channel.description:
Look at how many users are on: 27 atm I typed this.
Do you notice something wrong here?
I do! Remember there used to be over 80+ registered users on? What the hell happened? I think MITB is slowly going to get less and less active.

item.title: Mitb
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“frank_, post:17, topic:202423”][quote author=ninja nub link=topic=267128.msg2206149#msg2206149 date=1209452256]

Moparape?

No thx

How about … AN UBER AWESOME RUNESCAPE BOT. Better than MTA :D.

@Casey: True, but I’m talking about MITB. I could care less about those idiotic moparscapers.
[/quote]this whole thread made me gag, but this post was the crux

everyone who has previously posted in this thread is a moparscaper, it is only yz that isnt an idiot. we do not need more people, we need better people[/quote]
…Win.

Neither me.

Read full topic

item.title: Mitb
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“magma828, post:1, topic:202517”][quote author=cooper link=topic=267128.msg2206548#msg2206548 date=1209485738]

this whole thread made me gag, but this post was the crux

everyone who has previously posted in this thread is a moparscaper, it is only yz that isnt an idiot. we do not need more people, we need better people

Not me.
[/quote]

You would prefer it to be like the moparscape forums where shit gets posted every few seconds?

I like it this way too…[/quote]
Huh? I was just saying I wasn’t a moparscaper.

Read full topic

item.title: Mitb
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

It’s mainly because most users online are online at MoparScape, and don’t bother to come over here to this side of the forum, and some of them don’t even know of this side of the forum to begin with.

Other than that, it’s because MoparScape.org is being attacked, and when the occasional ban happens over here, neither site can be viewed, in which people usually get side tracked of trying to get onto the forum, so they leave and come back a few hours later. I’m saying this because I do it as well. Anyways, when the constant attacking stops, I bet more people will be back on the forums.

It also may be because for some people exams for school and such are quickly approaching, in which members are taking a rest from the forums to concentrate on those, just like Daviddude (I’m using him as an example just because I know this is the case with him). I bet the amount of users will start to increase in a few more weeks when these exams finish.

Read full topic
